teachings.title: You Have Dominion
teachings.content_md:
## You Have Dominion

This is the first teaching in the DIMS system.
It was inserted as a sample to confirm that Supabase + Netlify are connected.

Stay tuned for more teachings!

teachings.title: Origin Words
teachings.content_md:
## Origin Words

In the beginning was the Word. This teaching explores the foundations of speech and its divine origin.

teachings.title: Dominion Revolution – Lesson 1: The Call to Dominion
teachings.content_md:
### Lesson 1: The Call to Dominion

God’s original mandate for man to rule, subdue, and have dominion.

teachings.title: Dominion Revolution – Lesson 2: The Kingdom and the Thrones
teachings.content_md:
### Lesson 2: The Kingdom and the Thrones

Understanding the Ancient of Days and the transfer of dominion to the saints.

teachings.title: Dominion Revolution – Lesson 3: Kings and Priests
teachings.content_md:
### Lesson 3: Kings and Priests

How Christ redeems us not just as servants but as kings and priests in His Kingdom.

teachings.title: Dominion Revolution – Lesson 4: The Revolution of Voices
teachings.content_md:
### Lesson 4: The Revolution of Voices

Prophetic alignment, testimony, and the overcoming power of the blood of the Lamb.

teachings.title: Dominion Revolution – Lesson 5: The Nations and the Kingdoms
teachings.content_md:
### Lesson 5: The Nations and the Kingdoms

The climax of the revolution when the kingdoms of this world become the Kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ.
